metadata.synopsis: Players use the submersible to travel to the Iron Throne submersed building. On the way, spectator guards meet them and trigger the explosives on the upper dome of the facility. With little time before the prison facilities collapse, the players dock with the station, aiming to save the prisoners before it's destroyed.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Use the Submersible to travel to the Iron Throne, plays automatically at this point.

2.text: I warned you to stay away once. I don't do second warnings.
2.context:
CinematicNodeContext: [Gortash videocalls]

A Scry Screen within the submersible flickers into life. Gortash, secure in his office, appears. He's angry.|

41.text: I warned you to stay away once. I don't do second warnings.

31.text: Intruders! Lord Gortash's orders were clear, the Iron Throne must be destroyed!
31.context:
CinematicNodeContext: [SUBMERSIBLE FINDS IRON THRONE]

The party travels with the submersible to the underwater Iron Throne building. A lightbeam spotlights the water in front of the submersible, seeing nothing but murky water until the Iron Throne comes into view - a ruined, submerged multi-storey building, topped by new, domed construction.

52.text: Intruders! Lord Gortash's orders were clear, the Iron Throne must be destroyed!
52.context:
CinematicNodeContext: [SUBMERSIBLE POWERS DOWN,]

As the party look on the building in wonder, the submersible engines power down and it comes to a stop. The spotlight flickers and then dies, leaving the submersible in darkness. Then the power returns, engines hum, and the spotlight kicks back into life.

8.speaker: Black Hand of Bane
8.text: Intruders! Lord Gortash's orders were clear, the Iron Throne must be destroyed!

40.text: Aren't you the intrepid little adventurer. Digging and diving where you don't belong.
40.context: CinematicNodeContext: Performed to scrying screen - like a video call

5.speaker: Player
5.text: Aren't you the intrepid little adventurer. Digging and diving where you don't belong.
5.context: CinematicNodeContext: Performed to scrying screen - like a video call

39.text: Aren't you the intrepid little adventurer. Digging and diving where you don't belong.

6.text: Aren't you the intrepid little adventurer. Digging and diving where you don't belong.

16.text: Aren't you the intrepid little adventurer. Digging and diving where you don't belong.
16.context: CinematicNodeContext: Performed to scrying screen - like a video call

13.text: And I thought we were friends.
13.context: CinematicNodeContext: Performed to scrying screen - like a video calInternalNodeContext: Only plays if players made a deal with Gortash.

50.speaker: Player
50.text: I'm here to rescue the hostages, Gortash.
50.context: InternalNodeContext: has mission from Steel Watch Foundry

47.text: Wrong. Your presence here is the only real threat to their survival.

42.speaker: Player
42.context: InternalNodeContext: only if on the quest to kill Orin

26.speaker: Player
26.text: What the hells is this place?
26.context: InternalNodeContext: only if on the quest to kill Orin

51.text: The Iron Throne. A ruin from the city's dark past that could become a template for a brighter future.
51.context: InternalNodeContext: only if on the quest to kill Orin

29.text: It is a most useful tool for motivating my Gondian workforce - key to the construction of the Steel Watch that keep the city safe.
29.context: InternalNodeContext: only if on the quest to kill Orin

35.text: But like all tools, the moment it ceases to be useful, I will break it. Thanks to your trespassing, that moment may have come.
35.context: InternalNodeContext: only if on the quest to kill Orin

19.text: Return to the city, find Orin, and claim her Netherstone as you agreed to do. And then I will forget this transgression.
19.context: InternalNodeContext: only if on the quest to kill Orin

9.speaker: Narrator
9.text: *Your conscience pricks - you did agree to an alliance, after all. But then again, what honour need there be with someone like Gortash?*
9.context: CinematicNodeContext: In respone to Gortash pressing the button, a series of explosion errupt around the submerged Iron Throne.

57.speaker: Narrator
57.text: *Your mind turns to the Gondian hostages, bound in fear, their futures hanging by a thread in Gortash's web.*
57.context: CinematicNodeContext: In respone to Gortash pressing the button, a series of explosion errupt around the submerged Iron Throne.

20.speaker: Narrator
20.text: *How many people are trapped within? How many lives will be lost?*
20.context: CinematicNodeContext: In respone to Gortash pressing the button, a series of explosion errupt around the submerged Iron Throne.

33.speaker: Narrator
33.text: *Not to mention your father. Captured, enthralled. He will surely perish if you do not intervene. His last breath taken as a slave to the Absolute.*
33.context: CinematicNodeContext: In respone to Gortash pressing the button, a series of explosion errupt around the submerged Iron Throne.

10.speaker: Narrator
10.text: *And what of Duke Ravengard? Wyll may never forgive you if you abandon his father to this fate.*
10.context: CinematicNodeContext: In respone to Gortash pressing the button, a series of explosion errupt around the submerged Iron Throne.

32.speaker: Player
32.context: CinematicNodeContext: In respone to Gortash pressing the button, a series of explosion errupt around the submerged Iron Throne.

30.text: That was a mistake. When the corpses start to wash up on the shore, remember - you could have prevented all of this.
30.context: CinematicNodeContext: In respone to Gortash pressing the button, a series of explosion errupt around the submerged Iron Throne.

54.context: CinematicNodeContext: In respone to Gortash pressing the button, a series of explosion errupt around the submerged Iron Throne.

27.context:
CinematicNodeContext: [SHOWING THE DAMAGE]

The submersible drives onward toward the collapsing Iron Throne, maneuvering its way through the debris. 

The spotlight hits one of the upper levels in which civilian gnomes and humans can be seen inside a glass-walled holding cell, which is already damaged. The submarine pans downard, passing another cell in which Grand Duke Ranvegard can be seen (provided Gortash's coronation already happened). He is calm, despite the chaos, thanks to his tadpole.

45.context:
CinematicNodeContext: [DOCKING]

The submarine continues to pan downward through debris-strewn waters, reaching a bay on the topmost level, where it docks with a thunk.

37.speaker: Player
37.text: Turn the submersible around and retreat.
37.context:
CinematicNodeContext: [Sub retreats]

The screen goes dark as Gortash salutes sarcastically, and the submersible turns around and heads back to the docks.

34.context:
CinematicNodeContext: [Sub retreats]

The screen goes dark as Gortash salutes sarcastically, and the submersible turns around and heads back to the docks.

43.context:
CinematicNodeContext: [Sub retreats]

The screen goes dark as Gortash salutes sarcastically, and the submersible turns around and heads back to the docks.

38.context:
CinematicNodeContext: [Sub retreats]

The screen goes dark as Gortash salutes sarcastically, and the submersible turns around and heads back to the docks.

1.text: Return to the docks, or the deaths of everyone inside will be on your conscience.

22.text: Tsk. You've been spending too much time with young Karlach - it's affecting your manners.

14.text: And your intelligence. Your presence here is a threat to the survival of the hostages inside the Iron Throne.

56.text: Dead, they are no use to me. So I keep them safe, after a fashion.

48.text: I have prepared for this eventuality, and if you interfere, I will destroy the Iron Throne.

25.text: Whyever would I do that? The Iron Throne is their home.

24.speaker: Player
24.text: Cut the crap, Gortash. I go where I choose, and I'm curious about what's down here.

36.speaker: Player
36.text: You shouldn't have got mixed up with a Bhaalspawn. I am going to sack you for all you're worth.

53.speaker: Player
53.text: You're mine to take from, Gortash. I am going to pillage you for all you're worth.

21.speaker: Player
21.text: Whatever you're hiding down here, I'm going to take it.

11.text: Hah! Are you now? Set foot within the Iron Throne and you will die. As will all of the hostages inside.

49.speaker: Karlach
49.text: Might be facing Gortash sooner than we thought.
49.context: NodeContext: Low and angry, expecting him to appear somewhere but she's not sure where.
